sn51.25:1.3: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu chandasamadhippadhanasankharasamannagatam iddhipadam bhaveti,
sn51.25:1.8: Imesam kho, bhikkhave, catunnam iddhipadanam bhavitatta bahulikatatta bhikkhuna dvinnam phalanam annataram phalam patikankham—
sn51.25:1.9: dittheva dhamme anna, sati va upadisese anagamita”ti.
